Entries.default: "You sure they don't just want to be petted?"
"What majestic kittens! I would adopt you all if only we had room on the ship."
"Don't you lick your chops at me. I have a bird and he hates cats."
"Just like back at the arena. The other arena."
"Cap, you know I'd be lying if I said I weren't thinking of - eh, it ain't worth it."
"Get your mind out of the gutter, Serafen."
"They're not half the size of snow bears."
"Mangy critters."
"They might look cute, but they'll tear your throat out if you're not paying attention."
"Someone must watch Ed√©r."
"Kitties!"
"Sssssssssssssnakey!"
"Watch for their archers."
"I give no quarter to snakes. Let us end this quickly, captain."
"Think these snakes will be as friendly as the ones at Hasongo?"
"Careful now, lest you're looking to get bit."
"Which fool god created these foul bastards? Answer me that, cap."
"They are less imbecilic than they look, Watcher."
"Where are their legs?"
"Vicious, calculating creatures. Be on your guard."
"They're about twice as clever as they look. Don't underestimate 'em."
"They are fast, Watcher, but we are clever!"
"You wouldn't think it, but they're shit for dancing."
"The bigger they are, the harder they hit."
"They had better not singe my robes."
"Make our size our advantage, Watcher."
"Will they not simply burn out if we wait long enough?"
"Someone better douse that before it gets out of control."
"Sakes alive, that's a big one!"
"Heh. Now I ain't the only one be feeling small."
"Try to split its focus. It can't concentrate on all of us."
"Remind me why we're here, Duskspeaker?"
"Anybody got a bucket handy?"
"You will water me if I am on fire, ta?"
"Uh, we'll go back to normal after, right? Right?"
"This is so... undignified."
"Merle. Desgant."
"We should try this later. Below deck."
"This feels unbelievable! How you doing down there, captain?"
"Well, Hel, I was used to that shape."
"Our minds are still our own. Do not let the material distract you."
"I feel... better, actually."
"I left Arkemyr so I could avoid nonsense like this."
"Do I have a tail? Can you see?"
"Uh, maybe I ain't should've had that last drink."
"Ever think we'll tame one of these? Maybe get to ride it?"
"Well, at least it's not a dragon. I've rather had my fill."
"I have seen birds larger than this at sea. Next time bring us a real dragon."
"You take this one, Ishi. I'll hang back and watch."
"Even dragons go to Hel."
"Aim for the wings, aye?"
"One of these turned into Neriscyrlas?"
"I wouldn't say no to a drakeskin belt."
"Aw, I wanted to fight a dragon."
"Drake! Furl the sails! Wet the powder! Oh, right."
"Hey, remember Korgrak? You think he's part of Eothas now?"
"Clever creatures. A shame no one suggested they bathe..."
"Smarter than they look. Let us not underestimate these brutes, captain."
"My last captain wasn't much better than an ogre. This should be satisfying."
"Well dang, Watcher, I don't know what all the fuss is about."
"Were we shipboard, I'd say knock 'em overboard and let 'em drown. Alas, we ain't."
"Perhaps we can use their rage against them."
"Don't let 'em close 'less you wanna be chucked around like a bag of potatoes."
"Teyuki, I smell them from here."
"Hey, I think they look a bit nervous."
"Over-confidence is as deadly as ill-preparation."
"Shall we put their confidence to the test, captain?"
"Captain, are you looking forward to this as much as I am? Thought so."
"Well, Hel, you don't have to fight us if you don't want to."
"Seems you got in their head, cap."
"They fear us. They should."
"Time to see if their insufferable boasting has any merit."
"I don't much like to fight kith, but for those fools I'll make an exception."
"I will punch all of them."
"A shame we have to meet like this, my friends."
"They'll die on their knees like everything else. Oh, but naga don't have knees, do they?"
"I could get used to this."
"I cannot say this is an improvement, but I cannot say that I mind, either."
"Ready, Watcher? Not that you've got a lot of choice in the matter."
"Fye, lat's hae't out, than!"
"For the Republics!"
"Let me know where you want me, captain. I am ready."
"Ready when you are, captain."
"Got my sickle sharpened for the harvest."
"Ain't normally one for exhibitionism, but let's be giving them a show, aye?!"
"Your end shall be slow and painful!"
"Time to put what I learned from Arkemyr to the test."
"Don't get cocky!"
"Tell me what to hit!"
"Ke ni tehun seliki hidu gawu."
"Drinks after, aye?"
"Everything's got a soul."
"Winner's the one that blinds the most eyes, Maia. The thing's got eyes, aye?"
"Hey Serafen, want to make this interesting? Whoever dies first has to haunt the captain."
"I've got your back, Fassina!"
"Caution will serve us better than speed!"
